column3: The life ahead can only be glorious if you learn to live in total harmony with the Lord.
I am not someone who is ashamed of my past. I'm actually really proud. I know I made a lot of mistakes, but they, in turn, were my life lessons.
He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
The boundaries which divide Life from Death are at best shadowy and vague. Who shall say where the one ends, and where the other begins?
My whole life is about winning. I don't lose often. I almost never lose.
I think that a man should not live beyond the age when he begins to deteriorate, when the flame that lighted the brightest moment of his life has weakened.
I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.

Be willing to step outside your comfort zone once in a while; take the risks in life that seem worth taking. The ride might not be as predictable if you'd just planted your feet and stayed put, but it will be a heck of a lot more interesting.
May you live all the days of your life.
I don't think you ever stop giving. I really don't. I think it's an on-going process. And it's not just about being able to write a check. It's being able to touch somebody's life.
Opportunities to find deeper powers within ourselves come when life seems most challenging.
A dream is what makes people love life even when it is painful.
It is by going down into the abyss that we recover the treasures of life. Where you stumble, there lies your treasure.

Tramping is too easy with all this money. My days were more exciting when I was penniless and had to forage around for my next meal... I've decided that I'm going to live this life for some time to come. The freedom and simple beauty of it is just too good to pass up.
Let every dawn be to you as the beginning of life, and every setting sun be to you as its close.
Live your life as though your every act were to become a universal law.
I think people should have fun. And don't get so down on yourself. Enjoy life and be the best person you can be.
Our life is what our thoughts make it.
Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.

Don't walk through life just playing football. Don't walk through life just being an athlete. Athletics will fade. Character and integrity and really making an impact on someone's life, that's the ultimate vision, that's the ultimate goal - bottom line.

Youth is not a time of life; it is a state of mind; it is not a matter of rosy cheeks, red lips and supple knees; it is a matter of the will, quality of the imagination, a vigor of the emotions; it is the freshness of the deep springs of life.
Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.

When we meet real tragedy in life, we can react in two ways - either by losing hope and falling into self-destructive habits, or by using the challenge to find our inner strength. Thanks to the teachings of Buddha, I have been able to take this second way.

Achievement of your happiness is the only moral purpose of your life, and that happiness, not pain or mindless self-indulgence, is the proof of your moral integrity, since it is the proof and the result of your loyalty to the achievement of your values.

It was my duty to shoot the enemy, and I don't regret it. My regrets are for the people I couldn't save: Marines, soldiers, buddies. I'm not naive, and I don't romanticize war. The worst moments of my life have come as a SEAL. But I can stand before God with a clear conscience about doing my job.
